means: 哭诉，无聊话，气愤的抱怨

sentence.Network_en: The more European voters balk at economic reform, the more politicians yammer on about values.
sentence.Network_cn: 畏惧经济改革的欧洲选民越多, 政治家们大谈特谈价值观的情况也就会越多.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 哭的英语怎么说_百度知道 ... snivel 啜泣 yammer 哭诉 shed tears 流泪.
求Y字开头的英文单词。 -外语-天涯问答 ... yamen 中国古代之衙门 yammer 叹息, 哭泣 yank n.猛拉.
哀号的英汉词典搜索结果，点击看详细翻译解释 ... knell1.  鸣丧钟 yammer1. 大声抱怨,大声说出 wailful1.  悲恸的；悲伤的.
“痛哭流涕”巧学英文词(图) ... whine 发呜呜声； yammer 哭泣叹息； yowl 号叫；.

list.key: The people are yammering for bread
list.abs: The people are yammering for bread. 人们呼喊着要面包。 I do wish they'd stop yammering on about the size of the bill. 我真希望他们别再嘟嘟囔囔地.
The people are yammering for bread ., 人们呼喊着要面包.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a verb meaning 'lament, cry out'): alteration of earlier yomer, from Old English geōmrian 'to lament', suggested by Middle Dutch jammeren

sentences.sentence: "The coyotes were howling in the desert"

auth_sentence.content: Just the thought that some dolt wants to yammer at me for what ever reason gives me pain.
